about_the_game:
Anyone can hold the helm when the sea is calm...

But can you manage the deck of the Forrestal class steam powered aircraft carrier, the USS Forrestal (CV-59)?

Carrier Deck is a fast paced time management game where you will play as the Air Officer on board a CV-59 in the midst of active war. You, alone, are responsible for all aspects of operations involving aircraft on the ship and you'll need to work fast to ensure everything happens in time for the highest chances of warfare success.

Load the right planes and helicopters up and ready them for the required military missions. Manage both launching and landing the planes, avoiding crashes that could spread throughout the deck wrecking multiple planes and damaging the ship.

In Carrier Deck, you'll manage a staggering array of aircrafts including the F14 Tomcat, A7 Corsair, A6 Intruder, S3 Viking and CH46 Sea Knight, through a campaign that covers the oceans all over the globe. Test your skills in a full spectrum of operations across the globe in extensive campaign mode, or just try the Skirmish mode for a quick challenge.

NEW FEATURES

- Completely new code and UI (Radar)

- Flex Deck settings (options to change deck layouts in game)

- New landing queue management (pattern)

- New range of Aircraft

- Control of supply inventory and resupply

- Control of aircraft rotations

- Editor: custom build your own enemy waves

- Sandbox endless version

- Upgraded Deck movement and automation

- Expanded warnings panel

- Smoother handling of the maintenance deck

- Scenario Win/Lose independent of Carrier Damage

- Losing aircraft and pilot rescue
